content.description:
Read this public sign.

[Traditional-character version]

報章期刊閱畢後請放回原處

[Simplified-character version]

报章期刊阅毕后请放回原处
content.question: Where would the sign most likely appear?

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
